name: realtime_chatroom
description: A realtime chatroom service based on websocket, written in Javascript and run with Node.JS.

scripts.travis-ci: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Liming Jin <jinliming2@gmail.com>
